messages.content: What is the capital of France?
The capital of France is Paris.
Why don't scientists trust atoms? Because they make up everything!
I don't have access to real-time weather data. You can check your local weather app or website for current conditions.
How do I make a sandwich?

Here's a simple way to make a sandwich:
1. Choose your bread
2. Add your favorite spreads (mayo, mustard, etc.)
3. Add your protein (meat, cheese, etc.)
4. Add vegetables if desired
5. Put the top slice of bread on
6. Enjoy!
